attributes.action: Make the Fractional Reserve system of Banking ILLEGAL
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How can it be allowed that a bank can lend out 10 times (or more) credit than the money than it actually has? This is money out of thin air! It doesn't exist. And yet this appears to be how most banks work and is called the Fractional reserve System of banking. If there is no connection between this and economic booms and busts then I am a Dutchman. I am not a Dutchman by the way.....
